comments: Sum of the n-th powers of the divisors of the n-th prime. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 17 2016
references: D. M. Burton, Elementary Number Theory, Allyn and Bacon, Inc. Boston, MA, 1976, pp. 56.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
maple: A062006:=n->ithprime(n)^n+1: seq(A062006(n), n=1..20); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 18 2016
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,22,print1(prime(n)^n+1, ", "))(PARI) for (n=1, 100, a=2, a=prime(n)^n + 1; write("b062006.txt", n, " ", a) ) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 29 2009(MAGMA) [NthPrime(n)^n+1 : n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 24 2015
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 27 2001
